trans-unit.source: Provides an iterator over a selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Biedt een iterator ten opzichte van een geselecteerde verzameling knooppunten.

trans-unit.source: An XPathNodeIterator object returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class is not positioned on the first node in a selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Een object XPathNodeIterator is geretourneerd door de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>klasse is niet op het eerste knooppunt in een geselecteerde set knooppunten geplaatst.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: A call to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method of the XPathNodeIterator class must be made to position the XPathNodeIterator object on the first node in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Een aanroep van de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>methode van de XPathNodeIterator-klasse moet worden uitgevoerd in plaats van het object XPathNodeIterator op het eerste knooppunt in de geselecteerde set van knooppunten.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using the XPathNodeIterator, if you edit the current node or any of its ancestors, your current position is lost.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer u de XPathNodeIterator als u het huidige knooppunt of een van de bovenliggende elementen bewerkt, wordt de huidige positie gaat verloren.

trans-unit.source: If you want to edit a number of nodes that you have selected, create a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> array, copy all of the nodes from the XPathNodeIterator into the array, then iterate through the array and modify the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Als u wilt bewerken van een aantal knooppunten dat u hebt geselecteerd, maakt u een <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>matrix, alle knooppunten van het kopiëren van de XPathNodeIterator bij de matrix vervolgens het doorlopen van de matrix en het wijzigen van de knooppunten.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the XPathNodeIterator class.
trans-unit.target: Er zijn twee manieren worden herhaald voor een <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>verzameling met behulp van de XPathNodeIterator klasse.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.cpp)] You should either use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.xpath.xpath_1_2.cpp)] You should either use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Combinatie van deze twee benaderingen kan leiden tot onverwachte resultaten.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method is called first, and then the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Bijvoorbeeld, als de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>methode wordt aangeroepen, eerst en vervolgens de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>methode wordt aangeroepen de `foreach` lus, de `foreach` lus wordt niet beginnen met het inventariseren van de resultaten van het begin van de verzameling, maar vanaf de positie na de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>methode.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: Deze constructor is aangeroepen door de afgeleide klasseconstructors status in dit type initialisatie.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a clone of this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer in een afgeleide klasse genegeerd, retourneert u een kloon van dit <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is positioned at the same node in the node set if calls have been made to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: De gekloonde <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>object is geplaatst op hetzelfde knooppunt in het knooppunt dat is ingesteld als aanroepen zijn aangebracht aan de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>methode.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is not affected by subsequent changes to this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: De gekloonde <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>object wordt niet beïnvloed door de volgende wijzigingen aan dit <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>object.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> object clone of this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Een nieuwe <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> kloon van dit object <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the last node in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee haalt de index van het laatste knooppunt in de geselecteerde set knooppunten.

trans-unit.source: The Count property does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: De eigenschap Count heeft geen invloed op de positie van de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: The index of the last node in the selected set of nodes, or 0 if there are no selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: De index van het laatste knooppunt in de geselecteerde set knooppunten of 0 zijn als er zijn geen geselecteerde knooppunten.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref>, positioned on the current context node.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer in een afgeleide klasse genegeerd, krijgt de <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> object voor deze <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref>, op het huidige contextknooppunt geplaatst.

trans-unit.source: You can use the properties of the returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object to obtain information on the current node.
trans-unit.target: U kunt de eigenschappen van de geretourneerde <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>object voor meer informatie over het huidige knooppunt.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: However, the returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object should not be modified.
trans-unit.target: Echter, de geretourneerde <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>object mogen niet worden gewijzigd.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object cannot be moved away from the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: De geretourneerde <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>object kan niet worden verplaatst van de geselecteerde verzameling.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can clone the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: U kunt ook klonen het <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>object via de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A>methode van de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>klasse.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Clone%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object can then be moved away from the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: De gekloonde <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>object vervolgens weg van de geselecteerde knooppuntset kan worden verplaatst.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method of cloning the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object might affect the performance of the XPath query.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode van het klonen van de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>object kan invloed hebben op de prestaties van de XPath-query.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectAncestors%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectDescendants%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectChildren%2A> methods result in no nodes being selected, the Current property might not be pointing to the context node.
trans-unit.target: Als de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectAncestors%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectDescendants%2A>, en <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectChildren%2A>methoden ertoe leiden dat er geen knooppunten wordt geselecteerd, de huidige eigenschap kan niet verwijzen naar het contextknooppunt.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectChildren%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectDescendants%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectAncestors%2A>

trans-unit.source: To test whether nodes have been selected, use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A> property as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Als u wilt testen of knooppunten zijn geselecteerd, gebruikt u de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A>eigenschap zoals weergegeven in het volgende voorbeeld.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the context node from which the node set was selected.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> object dat zich op het contextknooppunt van waaruit de knooppuntset is geselecteerd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext*> method must be called to move the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"></xref> to the first node in the selected set.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext*>methode moet worden aangeroepen voor het verplaatsen van de <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator"> </xref> aan het eerste knooppunt in de geselecteerde set.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the index of the current position in the selected set of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer in een afgeleide klasse genegeerd, krijgt de index van de huidige positie in de geselecteerde set knooppunten.

trans-unit.source: The index is 1-based.
trans-unit.target: De index is gebaseerd op 1.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the first node has an index of 1.
trans-unit.target: Daarom is het eerste knooppunt een index van 1.

trans-unit.source: An index of 0 indicates there are no selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: Een index van 0 geeft aan dat er zijn geen geselecteerde knooppunten.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns a positive integer.
trans-unit.target: Deze eigenschap retourneert altijd een positief geheel getal.

trans-unit.source: The index of the current position.
trans-unit.target: De index van de huidige positie.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object to iterate through the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Retourneert een <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-object op voor de geselecteerde knooppuntset doorlopen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned on the current position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object.
trans-unit.target: De enumerator bevindt zich op de huidige positie van de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>object.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: Er zijn twee manieren worden herhaald voor een <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>verzameling met behulp van de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>klasse.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the GetEnumerator method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.cpp)] You should either use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use the GetEnumerator method.
trans-unit.target: One way is to use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.cs)][!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.vb)][!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the GetEnumerator method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.cs)][!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.vb)][!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_41_2.cpp)] You should either use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>methode en <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>of gebruik de methode GetEnumerator.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Combinatie van deze twee benaderingen kan leiden tot onverwachte resultaten.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method is called first, and then the GetEnumerator method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Bijvoorbeeld, als de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>methode wordt aangeroepen, eerst en vervolgens de GetEnumerator-methode wordt aangeroepen de `foreach` lus, de `foreach` lus wordt niet beginnen met het inventariseren van de resultaten van het begin van de verzameling, maar vanaf de positie na de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>methode.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object to iterate through the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-object op voor de geselecteerde knooppuntset doorlopen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current*> property to the next node in the selected node set.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer in een afgeleide klasse genegeerd, verplaatst het <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> object dat wordt geretourneerd door de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current*>eigenschap naar het volgende knooppunt in de geselecteerde knooppuntset.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> object is positioned on the first node in the selected node set only after the initial call to the MoveNext method.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>-object wordt geplaatst op het eerste knooppunt in het geselecteerde knooppunt ingesteld alleen na de eerste aanroep van de methode MoveNext.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: The node set is created in document order.
trans-unit.target: De verzameling knooppunten wordt in de documentvolgorde van het gemaakt.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, calling the MoveNext method moves to the next node in document order.
trans-unit.target: Daarom verplaatst aanroepen van de MoveNext methode naar het volgende knooppunt in de documentvolgorde van het.

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to iterate over an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> collection by using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class.
trans-unit.target: Er zijn twee manieren worden herhaald voor een <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>verzameling met behulp van de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>klasse.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: One way is to use the MoveNext method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.cs)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.vb)] [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.cpp)] You should either use the MoveNext method and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> or use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: One way is to use the MoveNext method and then call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> to get the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> instance, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.cs)][!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.vb)][!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_1.cpp)] Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method and use the returned <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cs[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.cs)][!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.vb)][!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/m-system.xml.xpath.xpath_3_2.cpp)] You should either use the MoveNext methode en <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>of gebruik de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>methode.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: Combinatie van deze twee benaderingen kan leiden tot onverwachte resultaten.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the MoveNext method is called first, and then the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A> method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Bijvoorbeeld, als de methode MoveNext eerst wordt aangeroepen en vervolgens de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>methode wordt aangeroepen de `foreach` lus, de `foreach` lus wordt niet beginnen met het inventariseren van de resultaten van het begin van de verzameling, maar vanaf de positie na de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A>methode.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object moved to the next node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Als de <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> object is verplaatst naar het volgende knooppunt; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> als er niet meer geselecteerde knooppunten.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Maakt een nieuw object dat een kopie van het huidige exemplaar.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dit lid is een expliciete interface lid-implementatie.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Het kan worden gebruikt alleen wanneer de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>exemplaar is geconverteerd naar een <xref:System.ICloneable>interface.</xref:System.ICloneable> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Een nieuw object dat een kopie van dit exemplaar.
